column4: guys i have a major ubuntu problem, my login screen shows properly and when i log in all i see is a bunch of blurred patterns. ubuntu was working just fine up until this morning, anyone have any suggestions/ideas?
Reboot, select failsafe from the grub menu
alright ill try that, brb (ubuntu is on this computer)
I dont have a failsafe option in grub theres only recovery and memtest, i tried running the recover x from recovery btu i still have the same problem. any other ideas?
